front.title: Help Me Obi-Wan Kenobi (V)
front.gametext: During battle, target an opponent's character of ability of < 2 present with your Jedi;  target is excluded from battle. OR Cancel a 'react'. OR If Obi-Wan is at a battleground site, and your Rebel of Republic character (or Leia) is in battle at another location, add one battle destiny.
front.lore: Leia sent a hologram plea, 'General Kenobi, years ago you served my father in the Clone Wars. Now he begs you to help him in his struggle against the Empire.'
